@template defaultbootstrapthree


{{html:
    <div ng-app="eveTestApp">
}}

{{evegrid:
    schema.url=js.lxc:5000/system
    spec.json.path=/docs/spec.json
    entity.name=eco
    datetime.fields=epoch
	column.1.data=guid
    column.1.header=Time stamp
    column.1.format=<a href="/grid/eco?id={guid}">{epoch}</a>
    
    column.2.data=category
    column.2.header=Category
    column.3.data=level
    column.3.header=Level
    column.4.data=appname
    column.4.header=App name
    column.5.data=pid
    column.5.header=PID
    column.6.data=nid
    column.6.header=Node ID
    column.8.data=gid
    column.8.header=GID
    column.9.data=masterjid
    column.9.header=Master JID
    column.10.data=errormessage
    column.10.header=Error Message
    
}}

{{html:
    </div>
    <script>
    var eveTestApp = angular.module('eveTestApp', ['eveModule']);
    eveTestApp.config(['$interpolateProvider', function($interpolateProvider) {
        $interpolateProvider.startSymbol('{[').endSymbol(']}');
    }]);
    </script>
}}
